mapper.insert: insert into chas_yw_yjxx (ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, YJLB, JQMS, YJZT, YJJB, CFSJ, CLRXM, CLSJ, CFRXM, CFRID, CFQYMC, CFSBID, CFQYID ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_trunc('second', now()), #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yjlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jqms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yjzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yjjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{clrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cfrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfqymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfsbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfqyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update chas_yw_yjxx set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LRSJ = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), BAQID = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAQMC = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YJLB = #{yjlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JQMS = #{jqms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YJZT = #{yjzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YJJB = #{yjjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFSJ = #{cfsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLRXM = #{clrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLSJ = #{clsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CFRXM = #{cfrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFRID = #{cfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFQYMC = #{cfqymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFSBID = #{cfsbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFQYID = #{cfqyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, YJLB, JQMS, YJZT, YJJB, CFSJ, CLRXM, CLSJ, CFRXM, CFRID, CFQYMC, CFSBID, CFQYID from chas_yw_yjxx where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, YJLB, JQMS, YJZT, YJJB, CFSJ, CLRXM, CLSJ, CFRXM, CFRID, CFQYMC, CFSBID, CFQYID from chas_yw_yjxx
1=1 and isdel = 0
and BAQID='${baqid}'
and YJLB='${yjlb}'
and YJZT='${yjzt}'
and CLRXM like '${clrxm}%'
and CFQYMC='${cfqymc}'
and CFSJ >'${cfsj}'
and CFSJ >='${yjsj1}'
and CFSJ <='${yjsj2}'
and CFRXM like '${cfrxm}%'
and CFRID ='${cfrid}'
and CFQYID='${cfqyid}'
and CFSJ >'${kstime}'
and BAQID in (select baqref.baqid from chas_xt_baqref baqref where baqref.sydwdm ='${sydwdm}')

select * from chas_yw_yjxx where yjlb = '12' and cfrid in (select rybh from gg_baqryxx where (dafs != '01' and dafs != '06' and dafs != '09' and dafs != '10') and baqid = '${baqid}') and isdel = 0 order by xgsj desc

select * from chas_yw_yjxx where yjlb = '12' and cfrid in (select rybh from gg_baqryxx where (dafs = '01' or dafs = '06' or dafs = '09' or dafs = '10') and baqid = '${baqid}') and isdel = 0 order by xgsj desc
